name: Bounceboy!
description:
Hey there, thanks for checking out Bounceboy! This game was made in 3 days for the WOWIE! Game Jam. It was an absolute blast and I'm so glad i could take part.

Play as Bounceboy as he desperately tries to find spikes up 5 different towers, with harder challenges across each one. Sometimes death can make progress!

CONTROLS: AD OR LEFT AND RIGHT ARROW KEYS TO MOVE UP THE PLATFORMS 

Socials: Twitch: spacespytv - Twitch Discord: https://discord.gg/HqMXpqDD2g
